attributes.action: Give Cricket ODI World Cup and the Ashes 'Crown Jewel' sports status
attributes.additional_details:
The viewership for the world cup final (shown on freeview) peaked at 8.3 million. Contrast this with average viewing figures of 550,000 for the cricket world cup games on payview. The England vs USA Female Worldcup semi-final (available on freeview) was watched by 11.7 million.

The low visibility of cricket has impacted on participation and interest levels. To safeguard the future of the sport, it is essential that culturally important cricket events like the world cup are shown on freeview.
attributes.background: Giving the Cricket World Cup and the Ashes Crown Jewel / Category A status will bring them at par with other major sporting events that are shown on freeview such as the Football world cup and Wimbledon.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Eleanor Laing MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Epping Forest
